replies.msg:
考慮各區情況及交通選擇減少，為確保顧客和店舖團隊的安全。我們因此決定於下午5時關閉7-Eleven店舖。為顧客做成不便，我們深表抱歉。

Given the city wide disruption and diminished transport options, for the safety of our customers, and our team members, we have decided to close 7-Eleven stores at 5pm today. We apologize profusely to our customers for any inconvenience caused.

https://www.facebook.com/7ElevenHongKong/posts/2926800570668776
